scripts.build:node:dev: docker build -t node-dev -f ./Dockerfile-dev . && docker tag node-dev gmontag/node:node-dev && docker push gmontag/node:node-dev
scripts.build:node:prod: docker build -t node-prod -f ./Dockerfile-prod . && docker tag node-prod gmontag/node:node-prod && docker push gmontag/node:node-prod
scripts.build:nginx:dev: docker build -t nginx-dev ./nginx-dev/ && docker tag nginx-dev gmontag/nginx:nginx-dev && docker push gmontag/nginx:nginx-dev
scripts.build:nginx:prod: docker build -t nginx-prod ./nginx-prod/ && docker tag nginx-prod gmontag/nginx:nginx-prod && docker push gmontag/nginx:nginx-prod
scripts.build:swagger: docker build -t swagger ./swagger && docker tag swagger gmontag/swagger:swagger && docker push gmontag/swagger:swagger
